pkgmetadata.longdescription: UAV Mission Planner // The Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Mission Planner provides an easy to use workflow for planning autonomous obstacle avoiding surveys of rtf-UAVs to retrieve aerial or spot related data. It creates either intermediate flight control files for the DJI phantom x UAVs or ready to upload control files for the pixhawk based flightcontroller as used in the 3DR Solo. Additionally it contains some useful tools for digitizing and data manipulation.
